component.summary: Créez des interfaces utilisateur avec GTK

description.p: Cambalache is a new RAD tool that enables the creation of user interfaces for Gtk and the GNOME desktop environment.
Cambalache's main target is Gtk version 4 but it has been designed from the ground up to support other versions.
Cambalache je nový nástroj RAD, který umožňuje vytvářet uživatelská rozhraní pro Gtk a prostředí GNOME.
Hlavním cílem Cambalache je Gtk verze 4, ale byl od základu navržen tak, aby podporoval i jiné verze.
Cambalache ist ein neues RAD-Tool, das die Erstellung von Benutzeroberflächen für Gtk und die GNOME-Desktop-Umgebung ermöglicht.
Cambalaches Zielplattform ist Gtk-Version 4, es wurde jedoch von Grund auf für die Unterstützung anderer Versionen entwickelt.
Cambalache es una nueva utilidad para desarrollo rápido de aplicaciones que permite crear interfaces de usuario para Gtk y el entorno de escritorio GNOME.
El objetivo principal de Cambalache es Gtk 4 pero fue diseñado desde un principio para soportar otras versiones.
Cambalache est un nouvel outil RAD qui permet de créer des interfaces utilisateur pour GTK et l'environnement de bureau GNOME.
La cible principale de Cambalache est GTK version 4 mais il a été conçu dès le départ pour supporter d'autres versions.
Cambalache è un nuovo strumento RAD che consente la creazione di interfacce utente per GTK e l'ambiente desktop GNOME.
L'obiettivo principale di Cambalache è GTK 4, ma è stato progettato fin dal principio per supportare altre versioni.
Cambalache is een nieuw ontwikkelingshulpmiddel waarmee je snel gebruikersinterfaces kan bouwen voor GTK en de GNOME-desktopomgeving.
Cambalache richt zich hoofdzakelijk op GTK 4, maar is ontworpen om ook andere versies te ondersteunen.
Cambalache — це новий інструмент RAD, який дозволяє створювати інтерфейси користувачадля для Gtk і стільниці GNOME.
Основною метою Cambalache є версія Gtk 4, але вона була розроблена з нуля для підтримки інших версій.
New bugfix release!

ul.li: Mark Adwaita and Handy translatable strings

issues.issue: Issue #130 "GtkAboutDialog missing properties"
Issue #133 "Gtk.Grid Collapses so Not All Children Can be Seen"
Issue #135 "List of string properties that should be translatable in Adw"

description.p: New bugfix release!

ul.li: Fix reordering workspace update on gtk 4 projects

description.p: First bugfix release!
3rd party libs release!

ul.li: Add Adwaita and Handy library support
Add inline object properties support (only Gtk 4)
Add special child type support (GtkWindow title widget)
Add support for reordering children position
Add/Improve worspace support for GtkMenu, GtkNotebook, GtkPopover, GtkStack, GtkAssistant, GtkListBox, GtkMenuItem and GtkCenterBox
New property editors for icon name and color properties
Add support for GdkPixbuf, Pango, Gio, Gdk and Gsk flags/enums types

issues.issue: Issue #47 "Proper ui file(which compile properly), fails to open in cambalache and show error"
Issue #79 "Change column/row count of GtkBox and GtkGrid"
Issue #81 "No way to add rows to GtkListBox"
Issue #68 "Trouble with GtkHeaderBar"
Issue #82 "Can't change x and y values of widgets in Gtk4 when using GtkFixed"
Issue #62 "Many widget-specific properties appear to be missing"
Issue #83 "Gettext domain is not initialized properly"
Issue #66 "Allow adding new items directly in tree view instead of (only) through preview view"
Issue #86 "Automatically restart merengue when merengue crashes"
Issue #89 "Error `AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'info'` when deleting UI file"
Issue #90 "Cambalache fails to import valid glade/ui files"
Issue #75 "How to use GtkStack"
Issue #78 "How to use GTKAssistant"
Issue #63 "Allow automatically exporting on save (or make it easier to do so)"
Issue #91 "Unable to export"
Issue #85 "Provide icon selection for Button / Image"
Issue #92 "'Debug Project Data' does nothing"
Issue #9 "Support for libadwaita and libhandy"
Issue #59 "Reordering children in a parent"
Issue #100 "Signals get broken"
Issue #105 "Child layout properties not available when parent is a subclass (AdwHeaderBar)"
Issue #102 "Popovers are not visible"
Issue #104 "Error when trying to add children to buttonbox"
Issue #98 "No way to add tab in Notebook"
Issue #108 "Popovers stay on scene after deleting file which contains them"
Issue #109 "Cambalache adds to container GtkRecentChooserMenu even if prints that this won't happen"
Issue #110 "Screen flashing when creating GBinding"
Issue #116 "Error when trying to click at Notebook content"
Issue #117 "Error `'NoneType' object has no attribute 'props'` when changing notebook tab"
Issue #115 "Cannot copy/paste widget"
Issue #69 "Undo and redo operations don't always match up"

description.p: Bugfix release!

ul.li: GTK 4: fix placeholders in bin like containers (AspectFrame, Expander, Frame, Revealer, ScrolledWindow, Viewport and Overlay)

issues.issue: Issue #72: Superfluous space in tree view for unnamed widgets
Issue #58: Cut, copy and paste always manipulate tree view (instead of text boxes in Properties tab)
Issue #73: How to set children in GtkPaned?
Issue #67: Adding ad deleting a widget doesn't correctly refresh the left view

description.p: First bugfix release in 0.8 series!

ul.li: Add support for importing multiples files at once
Simplify add new UI file to project
Import/export UI meta data like license, author etc
Do not create extra placeholders on GtkBox and GtkGrid
Show toolkit target on type chooser bar
Automatically import UI file in current or new project on xdg open

issues.issue: Issue #48: Confusing error message when importing not .ui file
Issue #49: Error loading project
Issue #52: Importing multiple ui files
Issue #50: Add new UI file to button is confusing
Issue #45: Exporting and trying to import same project, cause to show error
Issue #46: A lot of empty spaces when importing glade project
Issue #53: Add error/warning/info, that for now Gtk4 projects won't work with Ubuntu 21.10

description.p: UX improvements Release!

ul.li: You can now also support Cambalache on Liberapay

issues.issue: Issue #22: Gtk.AboutDialog: license bug
Issue #10: Export widgets layout data packed in GtkGrid
Issue #23: Better appdata summary
Issue #25: Error about target version mismatch
Issue #29: Error opening project
Issue #27: Needs a better icon
Issue #31: Newest ver (git) doesn't display loaded UI
Issue #34: Translations aren't working in the interactive tour
Issue #35: Interactive tour isn't working anymore
Issue #30: Gtk types listed in Cambalache
Issue #36: Can't build Flatpak after the update of the german translation
Issue #38: Add translatable metadata to CmbPropertyInfo
Issue #37: Add support for translatable properties
Issue #39: Save window state (Philipp Unger)
Issue #41: Add clipboard support
Issue #33: No context menu on left pane, the "project view"

description.p: Bugfix release!

issues.issue: Issue #17: Numeric IDs instead of names in exported XML file
Issue #18: Theming for workspace background
Issue #19: Importing .ui file does not work properly

description.p: Flathub release!
New translations release!
First public release!

ul.li: Suport for both Gtk 3 and 4 versions
Import and export multiple UI at once
Support plain (no custom tags) GtkBuilder features
